# Slides

<embed src="slides-compressed.pdf#view=Fit" type="application/pdf" width="100%" height="600px">


```{r}
data.frame(
  asdf = vapply(1:16, function(i) {
    paste(sample(LETTERS, sample(4:16, 1)), collapse = "")
  }, character(1)),
  fdas = as.numeric(sprintf("%.3f", runif(16)))
)
```
